name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38435918

Ayla's workshop is downstairs—and it's more organized than Smith's. There's assorted bits of technology scattered about, but larger than you're used to seeing: conical drill bits standing about half your height, and large consoles that look vaguely reminiscent of the message board server, albeit incomplete. On a table in the middle, you see a scattered variety of tools, fractalline crystals, and explosives assemblies.

“Alright, sorry about the mess.” Her tone changes, voice a bit less airy. “And about Dorian. Now, what did you really want to talk about?”

> Talk about Liza. (Write-ins accepted.)
> What's going on down here?
> Write-in
